attributes.action: Make UK Law to protect our vote by Governing parties to stick to their Manifesto
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned, require Parliamentary Law/UK Legislation made, that protects our vote & that if a Governing party goes against their Manifesto, they must call a General Election within 4 weeks of their wrongful actions & the General Election must be held within 12 weeks of the calling of the new General Election. As an example, if a Governing party says in its Manifesto they will not increase taxes, then they must not do so during its term and must stick to it.
attributes.background: Both past & present Governments have gone against various aspects of their Manifesto. For a Governing party to go back on its Manifesto, is wrong & by doing so, those who have voted based on the Manifesto, have been tricked into voting for that party, this is also gaining votes by deceit.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Make breaking a manifesto against the law and trigger a General Election 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
